body: got a strange error using the intersecting mass component: "**1. This component only works with raw Rhino brep geometry and not HBZones.  Use this component before you turn your breps into HBZones**." [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/wiccjlsym0e8yaF2Lnebl2qgd*JkLARu2bDs21s3VumvF-YUNtuKoPiIDWkAaZXFiKpxgkAMISL2q2F4Yz7VMaeL1rj39a4D/Image4.png) Once the type hint of the intersecting mass component is changed from Brep to ghdoc, the error is gone: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/wiccjlsym0eKKzYvgY2KKBNnHmW2KRQtznznQcq9yLnq02bPrLSz4EQsLpT7nKTOwZHJh2GYo-mugPU3u8v2N8rZxRneQ7Bp/Image5.png) But two of the exterior wall surfaces were wrongly recognized as interior wall surfaces: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/wiccjlsym0d4z8juGBM6*TCVouPnkU3yA998FGQsot8jn12ixSZWN-DrQ9fN-33REBOeGsH0HzhwEtsPxu4JEpIObj25OD6U/Image6.png) This happened after I updated LB and HB just now. Am I missing sth here?
